title: Damage Dealt stat
body:
How much stock do you guys put in the damage dealt stat? I don't mean damage dealt to champions

Personally I think it is pretty important to all roles other than support. I think it signifies how much of the game you actually spent in combat of whatever kind.

Obviously if you just have super high damage dealt and none to champions, then you were absent from all fights and unless it was a mean split push that won the game was probably not good.

I'm guessing most people think it is a worthless stat because that is the general sentiment I have gotten from talking to people in post game lobbies
